name: AnimalFarm
0:
”Alexa, open animal farm”
”What noise does a cat make”
”What noise does a turtle make”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal farm
des:
Have Alexa tell you what noises various animals make.

Great for parents to use with their kids, you can ask Alexa what noise an animal makes as part of a game or if you're just bored of making the animal noises yourself!

Fun for anyone who wants to hear Alexa make animal noises :-D

Cows say 'moo'

Sheep say 'baa'
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
